name: Knight Owls
description:
The sea devours the unwary. Summoning is an imprecise magic, but it is powerful enough to keep you safe. Go forth, and seek glory. Seek a new home. RESTIA FULAR!

Knight Owls is a difficult roguelike strategy game for the Game Boy Advance. Build up a powerful spellbook and take on many enemies. Gather owls and upgrades while managing your health and money. Voyage through three zones, and defeat the final boss to win!

To play this game, the recommended emulator is mgba. I have no idea how well the game works on other emulators or on physical hardware.

Also, there is currently no in-game way to save your progress. If you wish to quit your game and resume later, you must select File -> Save State in mgba. (It's worth mentioning that endlessly reloading your save states is against the spirit of this roguelike game, and will make the game extremely easy!)

Made for GBA Jam 2021. Current version: Alpha
